dialog.text: Presentation day today :worried:  I hate speaking in front of other people and feel so stupid when I get asked a question.  You nervous?

Still what could possibly go wrong - right?!  I think Tanya is presenting first for our group - she is dominating our team so much - there won't be much for us to say and I will be sitting there like a lemon! I really hope we are changing teams next week.  Aren't you?

joins.text: Next one will be better, I'm sure!
You've had a good team this time.

dialog.text: We may be working together - here's hoping!  Have a good weekend!
